author: nikmagini
body:
Hello,

this is a minor patch release for PhEDEx agents.
The only change compared to the previous PhEDEx agent version 4.1.5 is a fix for issue #1006 causing low performance of the BlockDownloadVerify agent; already tested successfully at FNAL.

Note that this pull request can be merged independently of the cmsweb release cycle (PhEDEx agents are not deployed on cmsweb)

Thanks
Nicolo'
title: Update PhEDEx agents version to 4.1.7
